about_the_game:
MultiMaze is a party game, for 1 to 6 players, where players race through numerous labyrinths with unique and chaotic mechanics.


  • Chaotic matches: Race through mazes filled with traps, all while dodging the cunning of your opponents. Death awaits at every turn!

  • Very easy to pick up, difficult to master: The game is fun for all, and offers challenges, regardless of the players' skill levels competing.

  • Fast-paced: The races follow one another at a breakneck pace, and death won't give you time to breathe.


Infinite replayability: Thanks to procedural generation, each game offers a unique experience, ensuring great replayability!


  • Varied levels: Each maze has its own atmosphere and unique mechanics!


  • Funny characters: Choose from animals that are all more adorable than the next.


  • Multiple game modes: Race, survival, evolving challenge.


  • Player interactions: Whether by pushing or shooting fireballs, all means are good to hinder your opponents.

name: MultiMaze Party

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5257U, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050, AMD RX 460 or equivalent
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

short_description: Chaotic mazes, cute animals, ruthless races. Anything goes in this completely wacky local multiplayer game !
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
